1. Put the files on a usb drive or ftp it to your ps3
2. Install Terraria.pkg file via "Install Packages"
3. Install the update according to which firmware you have by using install packages again and click on the update.
4. Copy files from folder "exdata" to/ dev_hdd0/home/00000001/exdata / Using multimans file mangager or FTP (The folder '00000001' is your user profile id. If you have only one profile - that is the only folder you'll see under /home/
In case you have multiple profiles, copy the *.edat file to the one that you will be playing the game from.
If the folder 'exdata' is not present, create it  and put .edat file in it
5. Play.
